bAnimateConnections: Whether or not animated connections are enabled.
EnvelopeWireThickness: Thickness of default envelope analyzer wire thickness when connection analyzer is active.
EnvelopeSpeed: Speed of default envelope analyzer drawing over wire when connection analyzer is active, where 0 is full visual history (slowest progress) and 1 is no visual history (fastest progress).
EnvelopeDirection:
Whether analyzer envelopes draw from a source output (default) or from the destination input. From the destination input may not
give the expected illusion of audio processing flowing left-to-right, but results in a waveform with earlier events on the left
and later on the right (like a traditional timeline with a moving play head).
NumericWireThickness: Thickness of default numeric analyzer wire thickness when connection analyzer is active.
WireScalarMin: Minimum height scalar of wire signal analyzers (ex. audio, triggers).
WireScalarMax: Maximum height scalar of wire signal analyzers (ex. audio, triggers).
